snippet: The Day: The scaffolding that covers about a million feet of New York's sidewalks has its merits, but it is also depressing, sometimes scary and always ugly.
abstract: The Day: The scaffolding that covers about a million feet of New York's sidewalks has its merits, but it is also depressing, sometimes scary and always ugly.

headline.main: The Face of the City, Hidden Under Shabby Sheds
